title: Watt

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Power Shock**: Roleblock and Short-Circuit a target. (2 uses.)
- **Mega Shock**: Short-Circuit all Non-Koopa members tonight, disabling all their passives. (1 use)
- **Turbo Charge**: Boost a target's attack by 1 tier tonight, can self-target and be multitasked with the factional attack if no Koopa Killing is alive. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Using the 2nd or 3rd abilties give the first ability an extra use.
- If you aren't using your first ability, Enemies who kill you get Roleblocked and dealt a Powerful attack the next night, this is publically announced however, ignores the attack drop from not being the factional attacker.

desc:
Post 4358
*A baby Lil Sparky, small orb-shaped creatures who continually emit pulses and flashes of electricity, this one's wearing a pacifier.*
